subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Duckens Nazon scored in the 14th minute, and Haiti took a big step toward advancing from the group stage of the Concacaf Gold Cup for the first time.
snippet: Duckens Nazon scored in the 14th minute, and Haiti took a big step toward advancing from the group stage of the Concacaf Gold Cup for the first time.
